javadoc:
LocalDatabaseItem provides a FolderItem implementation for a local database. This item wraps an underlying VersionedDatabase if the file-system is versioned, otherwise a PrivateDatabase is wrapped.

This item utilizes a data directory for storing all files relating to the database as well as history and checkout data files if this item is versioned.

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment:
Constructor for a new or existing local database item which corresponds to the specified 
 property file.

params.name: create
params.comment: if true the data directory will be created

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment:
Constructor for an existing local database item which corresponds to the specified 
 property file.

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment:
Create a new local Database item which corresponds to the specified 
 property file.  The initial contents of the database are copied from the
 specified srcFile.

params.name: comment
params.comment: if versioned, comment used for version 1 history data

params.name: resetDatabaseId
params.comment: if true database ID will be reset for new Database

params.name: user
params.comment: if versioned, user used for permission check and history data

throws.comment: if database creation cancelled by user

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment:
Create a new local Database item which corresponds to the specified 
 property file.  The initial contents of the database are copied from the
 specified packedFile.

params.name: user
params.comment: if versioned, user used for permission check and history data

throws.comment: if database creation cancelled by user

methods.name: create
methods.comment:
Create a new LocalDatabaseItem and an empty updateable BufferFile which may be used
 to create the initial database content.

params.name: bufferSize
params.comment: buffer size to be used for new database

params.name: user
params.comment: if versioned, user used for permission check and history data

params.name: projectPath
params.comment: path of project in versioned database checkout is done (may be null for non-versioned database)

return.comment: open updateable empty BufferFile for initial content writing

methods.name: openForUpdate
methods.comment: Open the latest database version for update.

params.name: checkoutId
params.comment:
reqiured for update to a versioned item, otherwise set to -1 for
 a non-versioned private database.

name: LocalDatabaseItem
comment:
LocalDatabaseItem provides a FolderItem implementation
 for a local database.  This item wraps an underlying VersionedDatabase
 if the file-system is versioned, otherwise a PrivateDatabase is wrapped.
 
 This item utilizes a data directory for storing all files relating to the
 database as well as history and checkout data files if this item is versioned.
